column5: that just sounds wrong

Sweet, congrats on the chinny! I bet your still pumped!  From the fish not the douch hole, I've learned a new trick, I pick up rocks pretending to look for bugs and I throw them in the run beside the fools. They either leave or a good. argument starts.
549 views 24 replies. I bet the    and the other snaggers are reading this cant we weed out the lurkers?
you must be worried about your day then...  congrat's Brian on a new PB/1st!  I say PB as it's your first salmon on a centerpin...
Nice fish Brian. Still looking to get my first salmon on the pin also. Scooter

Thanks again.  Terry is now a member of the dark side.LOL     LOL  Yesterday there were 3 cars. This morning,the lot was full. And I didnt even say where I was,guess it must of been the gravel,that was the give away.LOL
Wait till you get a knuckle buster!!  You will learn quickly how not to hold a pin !!!
That's awesome Brian
My turn.
nice fish brian congrats
Thanks   Learnt that already at my begining stage. Good to go now.  You bet Blair.
Nice fish Brian. Must have been a blast getting that on the pin.

First off,what a great morning to be on the river. Well it was, til this rude   thought it was ok to walk out in front of me where I was setting up. I said,what are you doing? He says,going to fish here. I say,you dont see me standing here? He says,theres room for both of us. I say,are you one of those rubes I hear tell about? What?. A few choice words and I start walking . Ignorant  Anyways,on with my morning. I walked down to my next favorite hole,still pissed at this    I decide to give a large yok bead a go ,under the float. A few drifts in,and I get smacked. Set and this fish comes out head shaken. Rods bent to the point,I knew I had to back off on putting the boots to this one. I had talked to Spiel about the new rod handling a salmon earlier this month,and he told me as long as your not heavy on it,it will be fine. So this fish is pretty fresh,and full of spunk. If he wanted to run,I would let him. Knowing there was head shakes,I knew the hook was set in the yap,so the battle could be won.  About 10 minutes into the battle (may seem long to some,but this was my first with the pin)I was able to direct him to a gravel bank. Just when I thought I had him beached,off he went again   . I,m saying to myself,OMG,come on.  fish.  Ok,lets just play this out for a bit more. Finally after about another five minutes,I was able to get him on the gravel bank again. I grabbed him by the tail,and pulled him out of the water.  My first salmon on the pin,and like I was told,it was going to be a wild ride.    The fall colors are starting as well.     Thanks for reading

First things first. Nice Fish man Congratulations!!  on catching it on the pin, and yes i have come across a lot of ignorant people like that, just come in and for what ever reason start fishing beside you like there an alien and have just arrived...like the rest of the river doesn't hold fish...you did the right thing by walking away even though you could have reacted physically...i know the temptation!!! .....now for my ignorance ... What does pin mean ? my assumption is a  fly reel,  Troy ~
You should have flossed him. Congrats on your first pin-chinny!

It is a free spool reel,that you control with your finger/thumb. Depends on your method.  It allows for long drifts.  I hope those that have more experince,can answer your question.   Back in the day Brian,it would of happen. Not worth it. I walked a good 5 miles down and back today. When I was done,I was the winner.  Thanks bud.
Should have just greased him out
Does that involve rubber gloves!
Not in my version  :)
Lmao funny
Congrats Misfish - that must have been a blast. !!
Like you said Bill. Come November,their all history.
That sucks Brian, that's why I make those insane hikes! Rubes everywhere ;-)
I like those insane hikes.  It,s you that got me starting to do them.
Yup, most of those guys don't like the cold weather   I've still got that roe in the freezer with your name on it!
WTG Brian!!!!!,I'm sure that must of been wild!!.
lets see lake or river .....hmmm
You can drive miles,or you can walk 10. Hard choice.
Great fish! I've had about 7 on this year but they've all gotten off, they sure do fight hard! We should get out some time.
Congratulations on your pinned salmon and on your approach to the idiot you encountered.
Very nice hookup, as you mentioned that must have been a head shake fight supremeo. 50/50 weight distribution for that fish, just like a Porsche.
pure beauty. nice fish!
Wy to go Brian!  Salmon are so powerful, it's always a rush to land one.
Aren't you glad you moved to another spot B?  Great job and congrats on your first
Way to go Brian.
Nice shootin B,,,  you have just discovered the most fun you can have with your clothes on...now take a trip down to Lake O tribs and hook into the monsters down there...
Thanks guys.   Hey Dave,Im not a shoulder to shoulder kind of a guy,even with my cloths on.  Meeting up with me bud this morning,to see if I can convert him,,,,,,,
